title: Skinny fish dish
ingredients: ['1 large white onion, chopped', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 tin chopped tomatoes', '1 tablespoon dark brown soft sugar', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '2 large cod, pollock or haddock fillets, smoked or unsmoked']
